abstract: A Sanford C. Bernstein analyst suggests that Yahoo is worth more split into pieces than it is now. That’s not going to happen, so the company may end up being a piece of something bigger yet.
snippet: A Sanford C. Bernstein analyst suggests that Yahoo is worth more split into pieces than it is now. That’s not going to happen, so the company may end up being a piece of something bigger yet.
lead_paragraph: An analysis by Sanford C. Bernstein analyst Jeffrey Lindsay that assesses Yahoo’s value is getting a lot of attention at Barrons, CNNMoney and DealBook.

headline.main: Breaking Up Is Too Hard for Yahoo to Do
